title: Boogie doodle
brief_description: An animated film, made without the use of a camera, in which boogie” played by Albert Ammons and synchronized with “doodle drawn by McLaren, frame by frame directly onto film stock, combine to make a rhythmic, colorfully beguiling film experiment. The main title appears in eight languages.
